gameRecap.title: Game Recap: 76ers 129, Pistons 111
gameRecap.excerpt: The 76ers defeated the Pistons, 129-111. Joel Embiid recorded 41 points, 11 rebounds, and five assists for the 76ers, with Tobias Harris adding 21 points and seven rebounds in the victory. Bojan Bogdanovic tallied 33 points and two assists for the Pistons in the defeat. The 76ers improve to 16-7 in the regular season, while the Pistons fall to 2-22.
